ReplLocation_01:
Behold, my little bird, poking your curious nose where it is allowed and where it is not.
Before you, on a wooden lectern, lies the written Talmud.
And if, cretin, you suddenly get lost. By my grace, you can find your way here.
All it takes is a stroke of the pen. And let the gates open!
ReplActor1_03: Oh yeah, baby! Bite me, bitches! Immortal Chris is immortal, and ready to demolish your cabins!
ReplActor1_04: Hehehehe, oh yeah. Looks like I'm so LIT that this hotel is about to burn down.
ReplActor2_02: It looks like this is not an accident, but a pattern.
ReplActor2_04:
Ugh, but my limbs still ache.
Curious.
ReplActor2_05:
That's... That's very much in the spirit of the hotel.
I'm not even surprised.
ReplActor2_06: Hmm. At least the rest of the pages seem to be intact.
ReplActor5_04:
Looks like I really won't be leaving this purgatory that easily.
If I ever do.
ReplActor5_05: And so the wanderings of Ahasuerus have ended.
ReplActor5_06:
The unknown volume is almost in the oven. Or should I say, all the bridges are burned?
No, I don't like any of this.
ReplActor5_07: It's only good enough to sprinkle ashes on your head.
ReplActor6_01: Oh my god! I'm here again!
ReplActor6_02: I'M IN THIS filthy toilet AGAIN!
ReplActor6_04:
N-no! NO! Stop it, Clarissa. Don't cry. I c-c-can't...
I have no choice...
ReplActor6_05: Oh my God! How did this happen? Well, what else was there to expect...
ReplActor6_06: Well, at least the rest didn't burn. That's good. I guess.
ReplActor6_07:
No way, that won't work.
The piece of paper burned, and the signature remained.
Location_6_Actor2:
I couldn't do anything in that situation.
How useless I am...
Location_6_Actor5:
...
You might just crawl out of the wall of some toilet.
Location_7_02: You could squeeze through this narrow tunnel, but the metal bars are in the way.
Location_7_04: Baby porcelain bathtub, filled with a thick, almost black liquid. It gives off a faint smell of copper and decay. The surface is motionless, like gelatin, but when you pass your hand over it, the reflection distorts, revealing for a moment someone else's face.
Location_7_06: The liquid is icy and viscous, as if dozens of fingers were wrapped around your wrist. At the bottom, among the matted hair and something soft, you feel something metallic.
Location_7_07: As soon as you pull your hand out, the liquid does not drain - it slowly soaks into your skin, leaving scars on your palm. A quiet laugh comes from the drain hole.
Location_7_08: An old porcelain bathtub filled with a thick, almost black liquid. You don't want to touch her again.
Location_8_01:
What the fuck!
Did that woman just fly apart?!
That shitty, shitty, shitty hotel and its fucking jokes!..
Location_8_02:
As soon as I showed her the key, she...
It doesn't look like a normal death. More like... Teleportation?
It's like he or it intervened and didn't let us leave the floor peacefully.
Location_8_03:
How... beautifully she did it.
So sad and so... beautiful.
Location_8_04:
Elsa! Oh my God! Elsa!
What's wrong with this place?!
Location_10_90: The brick floor here rises up in shapeless mounds.
Location_10_91: Following the contours of the mounds, you eventually realize that you are looking at a crawling human figure with an outstretched arm.
Location_10_92: Whatever happens, it looks like he is now permanently attached to the hotel.
Location_10_93: This counter can seat at least 20 people. The local administration clearly didn't skimp on the design of this area.
Location_10_93Chris: Whoa, what do we have here? More free booze? Damn, although after last time...
Location_10_93Jeffrey: Tempting. But no. I need a clear head.
Location_10_93Clarissa: So much stuff here! I'm not a fan of it, of course, but maybe... N-no! Not right now for sure.
Location_10_93Selena: Hmm? So much interesting stuff here. A redneck artilleryman would definitely be happy with this ammunition.
Location_10_94: A long bar counter with dirty stains and worn-out chairs.
Location_10_96: You've already spent enough time on these magazines.
Location_10_97: You see yourself in all your glory in the mirror. Abrasions on your body and dirty, tattered clothes - a stay at the hotel does not pass without a trace. But something is still wrong, except for your appearance.
Location_10_98: And indeed. The room reflected in the mirror, identical at first glance, is still different. Different furniture, different coverings. Are you different? This could be another game of an inflamed mind. Or something more. Is there any point in disturbing another unknown?
Location_10_99: Down with prejudices. With a single blow you break the glass. No meanness, however, occurs. Instead, a passage into the «looking glass» is discovered.
Lectern_0: The administration of «Abenaki mountain hotel» is pleased to present you with a new catalog of services! Here you will find the best that our hotel has to offer. And we will start with the world of art. Have you ever dreamed of creating paintings that can absorb the viewer? Then the unique workshop of the creator will definitely suit you.
Lectern_1: Are you stuck in the swamp of everyday life? Are you dragged down by paperwork and problems at work? Do you feel like you haven't rested for a long time? Then be sure to visit our pool! Unique in its kind, it will allow you to wash away all your worries. And our best waiters will definitely take care of you.
Lectern_2: After a long day in nature, what could be better than a glass of good whiskey? Or maybe a martini for your companion? You can find all this in our lounge area. The drinks presented here literally bewitch. And a truly magical fireplace. There will be something for your little fidgets too!
Lectern_3: We know that unexpected tasks can sometimes cut to the quick, and urgent matters force you to tear yourself apart. That's why we have prepared business class rooms especially for entrepreneurs. They have everything you need not only to work, but also to do it in comfort.
Lectern_4: If the names «The Song of Roland», «The Nîmes Cart» and «The Ring of the Nibelungs» are not an empty phrase for you, then your choice is a room stylized as the chambers of a medieval aristocrat. And for the entertainment of noblemen, every Sunday we put on an old play based on folklore.
Lectern_5: «No pets allowed!» Have you ever heard that? But not here. At the «Abenaki mountain hotel» we understand how hard it can be to part with your beloved pet. That's why we have equipped everything necessary so that your little friend can enjoy your vacation with you. You won't find this in other hotels.
Lectern_6: Everyone deserves a quality vacation. That's why our hotel has special luxury rooms. In them, we have combined style, comfort and coziness, and all this at an affordable price. In such luxurious conditions, you will forget yourself.
Whiskey2: You open the bottle - the smell of alcohol and rotten spices. «One sip won't hurt,» you think and take a swig. Something alive slides down your throat, clinging to your esophagus. You choke, but it's already inside. There's a stir in your stomach. The words 'ACCEPT. APPROVED. OCCUPIED' appear on the label. Your throat itches from the inside.
SafeActor1_1:
Holy cow! This is like my exact room!
They even brought me a guitar.
SafeActor1_2: Fuck. Maybe it's not that bad.
SafeActor1_3: At least I'll take a break from these jerks.
SafeActor1_5: It's like we had it in Michigan.
SafeActor1_6:
Now when I get out I'm going to have an immortal tour, fuck.
I just need to find new morons.
SafeActor2_1: Well, I'll be damned. Everything is just like in my office.
SafeActor2_2:
Even the stain on the floor.
Well, what's surprising?
SafeActor2_3:
I'd better take advantage of the quiet moment.
At the same time, I can think it over with my favorite book.
SafeActor5_3:
That's right! I'm back in my native home.
Relatively.
SafeActor5_4:
It looks like there might be some pleasant surprises here.
Or maybe I rejoiced too soon.
SafeActor5_5: Well, what's the difference? I might as well take advantage of this peculiar invitation.
SafeActor6_2: Oh-oh! It's about to start again.
SafeActor6_5:
Hmm. It's even calmer here.
No poltergeists or ghosts of the past.
SafeActor6_6:
Oh! And even exercise machines!
Well, that means we can work out and take our minds off this madness.
Manny1Actor1: Come on, you disgusting carrion, what are you standing there for?!
Manny1Actor4:
Oh my God!
How is that even possible!?
Manny2Actor1: What the fuck, wasn't once enough!?
Manny2Actor2: How many of them are there?
Manny2Actor3: What kind of a parade of lookalikes is this?
Manny3Actor1:
You're fucking kidding me!
You're definitely screwed!
Manny3Actor2:
For heaven's sake!
It can't be the same one, can it?
Manny3Actor3: Oh no, it's just beyond my comprehension!
Manny4Actor1: Fuck, I'm already tired of putting them out...
Manny4Actor3: One after another, one after another.
Manny5Actor2: No, they're definitely different. But then who are they?
Manny5Actor3:
Here, apparently, nothing can disappear forever.
Not even a tree.
Manny5Actor4:
I've run out of strength.
Maybe I should just...?
Manny6Actor1: Bitch! Bitch! Bitch! How annoying are you!
Manny6Actor2:
Here's another one. Hmm. Stop. The uniform...
Hey!
Manny6Actor3: Well, I hope they at least pay me back properly.
Manny7Actor1: Oh shit, what am I going to do to you now, you fucking devil...
Manny7Actor2: The hotel uniform. Is it just a coincidence?
Manny7Actor3: Well, now I can call myself Snow White.
Manny8Actor1: Come on, you vile scum, what are you standing there for?!
Manny8Actor4:
There's no escape from them!
Oh my God!
ActorElsa_00:
Look what I found while you were gone!
I hope you find this useful.
ActorElsa_01:
Where is everyone else?
It seems like there used to be more people in this lobby.
ActorElsa_02:
It's so cold here, do you know why?
I felt warmer among the candles in the hallways of this floor...
ActorElsa_03:
Hans... what you're doing is so much like him. The one who built dreams for me in the darkness...
my hero who never came...
ActorElsa_04: My father always said that hunters have no place in our world, but you... you can change this story.
ActorElsa_05:
When I was walking, I think I saw him - Auguste! Could it have been him, or have I gone crazy?
Now this darkness will never let me go...
ActorElsa_06:
I have to help you escape, and my Hans...
we can't be part of this suffocating play that he writes over and over again.
ActorElsa_07:
I was so naive and happy at the same time when I met Hans.
But now only the shadow of his image wanders around this hotel.
ActorElsa_08: Every time I hear these actors laugh, I feel like my throat is being squeezed... they lost themselves, and I lost him.
ActorElsa_09: Do you understand that this love is a curse? I hope that I can break this vicious circle with you.
ActorElsa_10: My father should never have known how I feel - it was his mistake, and now we all live in its consequences.
ActorElsa_11:
Maybe you can kill the monsters, but I'm afraid that Auguste's shadow will never will not escape me...
And from what he did.
ActorElsa_12: I believe in you. If you are a hunter, then we are the force that can cope with this tragedy and free these lost souls.
BrokenOne_01: It's not the weapon that kills... It's not the weapon that kills...
locationNowhere_1: Oblivion is the most accurate name for the place where you found yourself. Your feet are definitely on a solid surface. But is it physically real? After all, there is absolute impenetrable emptiness around, denying reality and absorbing sounds.
locationNowhere_2: After taking a few steps, you are convinced that the plane does not end in an abyss. But everything else is questionable. There is no temperature here. No sense of space. No air…
locationNowhere_3: This sudden thought tightens like a noose around your neck. You notice that there is no oxygen here. Or is there? No, it is definitely absent. But how did you breathe before? It doesn't matter. Panic begins. Convulsive attempts to breathe. You understand that if you do not get out urgently, you will suffocate.
locationNowhere_4: In vain. Cotton wool legs no longer hold you. Clinging to the glimmers of life, with force pushing the last bits of air into your lungs, you find a sharp object in your pocket. You bring it to your throat. And without further thought, with a sharp, decisive movement, you end the agony.
locationNowhere_5: It's as if a wet plastic bag had been shoved into your lungs. Short, greedy gulps of air are unable to unstick it. Weakness and dizziness overwhelm you, forcing you to fall to your knees. Having already prepared yourself for death, you open your eyes to find yourself on the hotel floor. Hoarsely wheezing, but alive.
MatthiasWindow_01: A sharp pain cuts your eyes. You were clearly not ready to see daylight. What is happening outside the window is even more of a surprise. Cottony wisps of clouds, the blazing evening sky and centuries-old pine trees stretching to the mountains visible on the horizon. Freedom.
MatthiasWindow_02:
«Freedom» - you think with longing and annoyance. Here it is, in front of you. But to get to it, you need to decide on a desperate step.
Are you brave enough?
MatthiasWindow_03:
No doubts. Only forward.
In the worst case, you will only return to the lobby.
MatthiasWindow_04:
A vision of you with broken bones appears before your eyes. Under the walls of the hotel. Deprived not only of the shackles of prison, but also immortality.
No, you're not ready to take that risk.
MatthiasWindow_05:
Run. Impact. Crack. And now you're in free fall. With it comes despair and fear. But it looks like the hotel survival school is going well.
Guided more by reflexes, you manage to end up on the ledge. Your face is broken, your arms are injured, but you're alive.
MatthiasWindow_06: The window breaks through without difficulty. A rapid fall. Floor after floor. «Just HOW MANY of them are there?!» — you think in panic, trying to grab onto something. The absurd fluttering is interrupted by the cornice. More precisely, your skull meets it.
MatthiasWindow_07:
What next?
The earth remains far below, not coming any closer. The only way out now is another window and a gloomy room behind it. Despite the possible threats to life, you decide to choose the lesser of two evils.
MatthiasWindow_08:
The experiment with the window almost turned into a disaster. You don't want to repeat it.
Although you note to yourself that if the opportunity arises, such an exit will be an acceptable solution to the problem.
EnemyEncounter14_1: Corridors, rooms, passages. You wander between them. Your mind is shattered by impossibility. How much time has passed? Hunger. Where is the exit? Despair. Did you hear things? Something flows down the grooves of open eyelids. Tears? No. Wet shreds form the silhouette of a skinny figure.
EnemyEncounter13: A shudder of chilling fear ran through her body as a silent whisper broke through her consciousness, evoking long-buried, shameful memories from the depths of her memory. Her heart pounded in her chest, not from the threat of physical violence, but from the crushing, paralyzing awareness of every mistake she so desperately wanted to forget. At that moment, a tall figure in a flowing robe, beneath which only the outline of decayed bones could be discerned, slowly appeared near the wall.
Girl_01: Look, what I was find. It will be useful for you, true?
Girl_1: Light is good. Very-very bright. Mom and Dad no like light. They make noise when no light. With light no noise, no surprise. Light is good. Light not let bad come. When light is there then no noise and fear and spookies. They not come out.
Girl_2: Here be loud uncle. Uncle get angry. Many sssay bad words. And also play cross-and-circle on floor. But me no can play. He ring in cross-and-circle and then run away through door. Mom have many uncles. They no be scared. They give tasty. And play. Most of all hide-and-find. I always win.
Girl_3: You are stinky! You smell scary bad! You smell like that giant with knife. He sometime come to little house. Maybe you give him that stinky thing in your pocket? Because you smell bad!
Girl_4: You are strange. And you smell. And you think much. Other also think. And also they be scared inside own special little house. And also in their house many rooms and spookies. Here many little houses. But I no be scared. I have no house. And no spookies. And the noisy box not go here and there.
Girl_5: My Daddy make many things. He can do much. Uncles and aunties here also can do much. They like Daddy. But you stupid, you can nothing at all. At school they say me that too. Ask uncles and aunties in houses. They will teach you. You will be like me. And we will be friend and can do many.
Girl_6: You have boom thing? Spookies be scared of boom thing. But must be careful and not be clumsey. Then boom thing will work. One time I see Daddy with one. He scratch his head with it and for some why cry. Maybe head scratch very strong.
Girl_7: Must be strong like Daddy. He was very strong. And often show Mom how strong he is. And also to uncles who be with Mom. But Mom from that cry. But I no cry. Because Daddy just pretend. But you no need. You be strong and you will scare spookies. They will cry.
Girl_8: And also in this little house happen many funny surprise. And you never know what funny will be next. One time I slide on floor like on hill! But you need special feeling. Not like with eyes and ears. Without special feeling will be no fun at all.
Girl_9: If you look much and do, you will know much-much. And for that you need big head. Then you will know even more. You need full head. Now your head like bucket. In my school they give you F!
Girl_10: You know Watchy-Lady? She look much. She look everywhere. I see her. Such pretty lady with flowers and leafs. She see all because she very atentive. You also can be like that! You must learn be atentive. And you will no be scared of dark.
Girl_11: Mom and Dad always in hurry. Always run away for doing things. From that was no fun. If you always hurry you also no will be fun. Surprise in houses is fun, but they take time. Spookies no like when someone run away from them. Nobody here have fun…
MannyPuzzle_01: At first, the world breaks the usual order: the familiar suddenly gets up from its head to its feet, and the person freezes, without having time to rejoice or be afraid.
MannyPuzzle_02: When the first stupor passes, the gaze clings to the details: smell, shape, sound. What seemed just strange a second ago suddenly seems so alien and wrong that you want to turn away.
MannyPuzzle_03: But when he turns away, he realizes that he cannot leave: what he has not accepted is still coming to him. My heart is racing, my breathing is racing, my body is ready to run or hide, even if my mind is screaming “don't move.”
MannyPuzzle_04: They don't live like this for long. Sooner or later, the forces run out, and instead of escape, there is only a heaviness in the chest. Memories are drawn to the past, to the lost, to what cannot be returned, and every step is given with effort.
MannyPuzzle_05: But there is a spark in this viscous swamp – resentment. At the world, at others, at myself. A fever is born inside, which wants to burn everything, prove it, strike first, before it hurts again.
MannyPuzzle_06: And when the fever breaks out, it suddenly becomes clear how ridiculous you look from the outside: words get confused, thoughts get stuck, cheeks flush, legs don't know where to put themselves, and my own voice feels like someone else's.
MannyPuzzle_07: To hide this fragility, a person straightens his back and purses his lips. Now he looks down from top to bottom, like a judge who is allowed to wrinkle his nose and curl his lips, as if other people's weaknesses are dirt on his shoes.
MannyPuzzle_08: And only when all this is played to the end, somewhere deep there is a quiet, childlike light: sincere, ridiculous, uncontrollable. He doesn't deny pain, fear, or shame–he's just experiencing the fact that you can still smile.
MannyPuzzle_11: You push the creepy mannequin head into the hole of the panel. Surprisingly, it slides inside, as if it was waiting only for you, fusing tightly with the stone, and for a while it trembles, as if trying to take its first breath.
MannyPuzzle_12: You try to push an object into the hole of the panel, but an invisible heavy force gently, like a palm from inside the wall, pushes it back out.
MannyPuzzle_13: The creepy mannequin's head is already frozen into the hole of the panel, and just looking at it, the thought of taking it with you again is instinctively disgusting.
MannyPuzzle_14: The panel seems to have been torn from the inside: a jagged hole зияет in the center of the painting, and a cold wind blows from its black depths. The hole is wide enough for you to crawl through.
Ev104_Desc: The silence of the corridor is pierced by incoherent mumbling. «HELPMEHELPHELPMEHELPME!..» you discern as you approach its source. It turns out to be an agonizing human being with a bloated and swollen lower half. Alo-raspberry and pulsating, it resembles a huge cancerous tumor fused with the floor.
Ev104_Ch1Win: You instantly recognize a plea in a person's gaze. So burning, so urging to action. Without taking your eyes off the unfortunate man's eyes filled with eternal torment, you approach him. A second, and your hand is on his cheek. A moment, and the unknown one melts with a sigh of relief, falling apart.
Ev104_Ch1Fail: The tearful eyes of a stranger call out to you. But what business is it of yours? Another freak in this endless nightmare. As you leave, you do not immediately feel something behind you. And turning around, you notice how something has swelled to a state close to an explosion. Which happens, showering you with a hail of wounding bone fragments and fleshy mess.
Ev104_Ch2Win: Another freak. Even the pleading look in his eyes doesn't touch you. Turning around in search of another path, you almost reflexively dodge the unexpected threat. A slimy tentacle with a bony sting flies past. A moment of failure is enough to seize both the initiative and the tentacle. The outcome of the contest is predictable.
Ev104_Ch2Fail: Inspired by the pleading look of the unfortunate man, you were heading towards him. However, realizing the absurdity of the situation, you stop halfway. This delay is worth a lot. A wounding appendage breaks out from the swollen halves. Fortunately, it pierces the shin and gets stuck there.
Ev104_Ch3Des:
{Ev104_Ch3}
The sight of a stranger sends tension through your guts. Like waves on the seashore, everything is seething inside you. Preoccupied with your own feelings, you do not notice the growth that has emerged from the tumor. Reacting only when it touches your skin. However, it does not try to harm. More quickly... Make contact?
Ev105_Desc: A maid's cart stood motionless in the dim hallway. A pale hand dangled from beneath a pile of dirty laundry. Her fingers moved faintly, and you caught a metallic glint—something clutched in this hand. A quiet groan made your blood run cold. Something useful... or terrible... could be found here. But the main thing was that the «mistress» was already close. Her footsteps came from around the corner. And her «cargo» was still breathing.
Ev105_Ch1Win: Your hand plunges into the rotting rags, through the foul odor and swarming flies. Suddenly, the dead man's hand twitches convulsively, as if demanding help. Your heart stops, but you overcome your terror, snatch the trophy and flee the cursed corridor in panic.
Ev105_Ch1Fail: Hoping to find supplies, you rummage through the cart's dirty linen. Suddenly, a hand shoots up from the rags, clutching your wrist tightly. You desperately try to break free, but the grip won't let go. A sudden flash of pain knocks you unconscious. Waking in a dank hallway, you discover the cart is gone, and a deep wound on your thigh, a reminder of the nightmare.
Ev105_Ch2Win: You reach for the cold fingers, trying with effort to pry them open, when the cart suddenly shudders—an agonizing groan emanates from its depths. The creature inside resists fiercely, but you, overcoming your fear and disgust, snatch the precious object from it. Your heart pounds wildly: in another moment, you must flee before the owner returns.
Ev105_Ch2Fail: You desperately try to pry the bony fingers apart, but your attention slips away—now the hand grabs your own fingers, squeezing them tightly, preventing you from breaking free. Struggling against the grip, your strength drains, you lose track of time, and, exhausted, you collapse next to the cart. When you come to, the cart has disappeared, the hallway is pitch black, and there's not a soul around.
Ev105_Ch3Des:
{Ev105_Ch3}
You quicken your pace, trying to shake off the unsettling feeling that the cart is following you. You stop running and, looking back, see that the cart has stopped—but now a small maid has appeared beside it, smiling ominously in the dim light.
Ev50_Ch3Des:
{Ev50_Ch3}
Primal rage tears you apart from the inside. The skin on your back splits with a wet crunch, releasing a tangle of slippery tentacles. Your eyes fill with thick blood, clouding the world with a crimson veil. The man freezes, fingers convulsively clenching the hilt of his sword. His jaw cracks open, revealing rows of needle-like teeth. «What a... touching sight,» he hisses, dissolving into the shadows.
Ev43_Ch3Des:
{Ev43_Ch3}
Something stirs deep in your belly, and you know it's not hunger. The skin on your arms rises in waves, revealing slit-like pores. Pale threads crawl out, grabbing bugs with unnatural precision. You hear them crunch as they disappear into your body. The itch subsides, and you do feel better. But your skin doesn't move anymore. It just... waits?
Ev44_Ch3Des:
{Ev44_Ch3}
The crack in the mirror pulsates as if alive, and strange voices whisper in your head: «You're ours...» But you only grin - you're used to being the center of attention, even demonic. «Not bad makeup, fucker!», you throw into the void, adjusting the imaginary microphone. The mirror trembled, the voices fell silent - even the darkness did not expect such impudence. But the reflection is no longer yours...
Ev16_Ch3Des:
{Ev16_Ch3}
Your heart is pounding, but you remember: this is how Caravaggio painted – living shadows. And then you notice – eyes are flickering in the bloody streams. The walls are shaking, the flesh is pulsating. You rush away before the monster takes shape. Behind you – a squelching whisper: “You are already part of the painting...” But you know – art lies. And this saves you.
Ev26_Ch3Des:
{Ev26_Ch3}
Your muscles tense reflexively, years of training taking their toll. You rush forward, your legs cutting through the darkness, and behind you, the whisper of shadows, the stomping of madmen merging into a single mouth. A turn, a jump across the chasm, and now you are safe, but... the silence is too wary. The adrenaline is still boiling, but you know: they haven't left. They are waiting. And the next run will be longer.
EnemyEncounter22_1: The administrator's mannequin, which has come to life, slowly turns around, the badge glitters like a fresh scar.The face frozen in surprise does not blink, but the gaze clings to you so intently, as if the figure could not believe that you are still alive.
EnemyEncounter22_2: Every step of the mannequin sounds like a dull, wooden thud.A face frozen in disgust with a raised upper lip and narrow, heavily narrowed eyes examines you as if your very existence here is a dirty stain on an ideal hotel.
EnemyEncounter22_3:
The mannequin seems to crawl out of the wall, the tight tie is twisted like a loop, and the patent leather shoes quietly scratch the floor.
There's fear on his face, his mouth stretched out in a silent scream, and his eyes, round as door peepholes, are fixed behind you, to where, according to his expression, something is already moving.
EnemyEncounter22_4:
The mannequin slowly rolls out into the light, as if afraid to drown in the shadow of the corridor.
There is a heavy, viscous sadness on his face: drooping corners of his mouth, an empty, dull look, and it seems that if he reaches out to you, he will not attack, but simply push you into the same hopelessness that holds him.
EnemyEncounter22_5:
The mannequin jerks out of the darkness, the fingers of his wooden hands are clenched so tightly that a soft crackle of varnish can be heard.
There is suffocating anger on his face: his eyebrows are drawn together, his mouth is pulled into a thin line, and his gaze, darkened and heavy, glides over you as if his only desire is to erase your presence from this hotel.
EnemyEncounter22_6:
The mannequin slowly comes out from behind the screen, as if he had just tried to hide behind it, and timidly puts one leg forward, creaking the hinges.
There is painful embarrassment on his face: his gaze goes to the floor, his lips are awkwardly pursed, as if the figure is apologizing for its own existence, and this makes its rapid, sharp movement towards you look even more unnatural.
EnemyEncounter22_7:
The mannequin slips out of nowhere, the movements are precise and cool, like those of a well-trained staff.
There is cutting contempt on your face: one corner of your mouth is contemptuously raised, your eyes are slightly narrowed, and this appraising glance gliding over you makes it clear that you have already been written off as trash here.
EnemyEncounter22_8:
The mannequin turns gently, like a perfectly rehearsed employee greeting a new guest.
There is a sticky, abnormal joy on his face: his mouth is stretched into an overly wide smile, his teeth are an even stockade, and his eyes, devoid of warmth, study you with such delight, as if the best moment of his shift awaits him — your next death.
EnemyEncounter15: Когда лампы вспыхивают, коридор замирает, и в тишине слышно лишь медленные шаги по ковру; из сгущённой тьмы вырастает высокий силуэт, и холодный голос в голове шепчет, что твоя кровь - густая и сладкая.
EnemyEncounter16: В зеркале на стене медленно проступает чужое лицо, кожа сереет, как отсыревшие обои, шея выгибается под неестественным углом, и, пока отражение делает шаг вперёд, становится ясно: назад в фойе вы уже не вернетесь.
SkillPerk_desc: Character's passive ability. Expand to find out the details.
SkillPerk_desc1: Character's combat ability. Open it to find out the details.
D_SkillPerk24: You've put your torn feelings back together and you'll never be the same again. In the new cycles, the hotel greets you a little less hostile: +1 Health, +1 max Sanity, +1 k INS for each character in the new game, a one-time reroll of a failed random event.
D_MannyHead: The head of a wooden mannequin.
D_MannyHead_01: The head of a wooden mannequin with eternally dilated eye sockets, as if the first second of a terrifying discovery was forever stuck in it.
D_MannyHead_02: The head of a wooden mannequin with lips bent back and a wrinkled nose, which smells with a rotten smell, forcing you to instinctively look away.
D_MannyHead_03: The head of a wooden mannequin with wide-open eye sockets and a mouth carved into a silent scream, just looking at which the skin runs cold.
D_MannyHead_04: The head of a wooden mannequin with drooping eye sockets and a thin crack at the mouth, as if he had been silently holding everything unspoken for too long.
D_MannyHead_05: The head of a wooden mannequin with deeply cut eyebrows and a grinning mouth, as if frozen at the moment when a dull rage is about to break loose.
D_MannyHead_06: The head of a wooden mannequin with with a downcast look and an awkwardly distorted mouth, as if she herself is trying to hide from your attention.
D_MannyHead_07: The head of a wooden mannequin with a raised chin and a lip twisted in a barely noticeable grin, as if even a dead tree considers you inferior.
D_MannyHead_08: The head of a wooden mannequin with a wide frozen smile and carved sparkling eye sockets, whose someone else's joy for some reason causes anxiety, not relief.
D_Bait_Item: A pile of rotten meat. Unknown origin and not suitable for food.
D_Bait_Use1: Use bait and distract the pursuer at the cost of a few precious minutes or save it for later?
D_Bait_Use2: You leave the bait to decompose in the dim light of the corridor. It smells so sweet and rotten that even the walls seem to be breathing faster. Having smelled this smell, the concierge will forget about you for a while, slowly turning off the route. But while he's tearing up meat somewhere in the dark, you remember: this is just a short reprieve, not salvation.
45АСР_2D: Cartridge with chemical tracer bullet. Contains toxic substances.
45АСР_3D: .45 cartridge with an expanding bullet. Shrapnel ruptures vital organs and reduces the enemy's defense.
BlankAmmo_D2: Strange cartridges with ornate symbols fit the blank-firing revolver. They give off a chill.
Harpoon_D2: A sharpened wooden stake adapted for firing from an underwater gun.
Buckshot_D2: A 12 gauge cartridge with an incendiary mixture. Ignites flammable targets.
Buckshot_D3: A 12 gauge cartridge filled with salt. Has extremely weak killing power.
D_RegretAbility: a deep sense of guilt awakens within you.
D_BloodBurns1: makes strange sounds... Your blood boils in your veins!
D_BloodBurns2: Scarlet threads burst from your wounds!
D_BloodBurns3: You feel your life draining away... The scars on your skin burn!
YouAreAlreadyDead_D: takes away your hopes and dreams.
SafeRoom1: The home environment has given you strength. You feel much better.
SutureMat_get: The sterile shine of instruments too precise for human hands. The needles leave behind not stitches but pale scars-runes. The threads are cold and damp, as if pulled from someone's twilight dreams.
Whiskey: A bottle of 35 year old whiskey shimmering with amber and gold. Only the wealthiest people can afford such a rare work of distilling art.
VinylRec_Des: The record chills my fingers, as if carved from permafrost. Do you dare lower the needle?
VinylRec_Play: An old, dust-covered vinyl record player towers in the dim light of a lamp. Its creaking sound evokes the voices of forgotten souls and evokes dark fears. They say anyone who plays a record in this hotel risks losing their mind: the melodies tear at the mind, and madness slowly overtakes the victim. You hear an ominous whisper—the record player is waiting.
